items: Stand with your feet hip-width apart, holding a medicine ball in both hands at chest height.
Lift your left foot off the ground and balance on your right foot.
Slowly hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and extending your left leg behind you.
Lower the medicine ball towards the ground, keeping your arms straight.
Pause when your torso and left leg are parallel to the ground.
Engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your torso and left leg back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps, then switch sides.
Improves balance and stability
Strengthens the glutes, hamstrings, and lower back
Increases core strength and stability
Improves hip mobility and flexibility
Enhances overall athletic performance
